concept.title: Stack
concept.shortdesc: Describes a decentralized and automated content pipeline that builds and deploys a static HTML5 website using DITA 2.0 and the DITA Open Toolkit.

conbody.p: Here's a brief description of the stack and workflow.

ul.li: OASIS DITA 2.0 defined content and navigation.
Ltest version of the DITA Open Toolkit generates HTML5.
Python applies HTMLplus plugin and responsive CSS.
Merge actions results in a Fleek pull.
URI availability is served through Fleek's gateway.
Resulting content is stored and pinned on IPFS.
